## Problem Statement

What problem are you trying to solve? Why is the current behavior insufficient?

## Proposed Solution

Describe what you'd like to happen.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative approaches? Why wouldn't they work?

## Compatibility

Does this change fit with the project's opinionated philosophy?

- [ ] This does NOT add alternative cloud providers
- [ ] This does NOT add Kubernetes
- [ ] This does NOT add complex configuration options
- [ ] This keeps the project simple and focused

## Use Case

Who would benefit from this feature? How would they use it?

## Additional Context

Any mockups, examples, or references that help explain your idea.
